story_summary: Kolya Krassotkin is a strong-willed and mischievous boy whose reckless bet to lie between railway tracks nearly causes his death, alarming his mother deeply. After the incident, Kolya promises his mother to avoid such dangerous pranks and becomes more thoughtful and modest, while his teacher Dardanelov, who loves Kolya's mother, gains some hope of winning her affection. Kolya also secretly keeps and trains a dog named Perezvon, showing a softer side despite his usual disdain for sentimentality.
